name: Guardian Conductor
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Cloud of Polychromic Nanobots" "202537" #L "Guardian Conductor Building Kit" "202572" a Conductor Program ( ie : #L "Conductor of Presence Program" "202566" ) #L "HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate" "202540" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Cloud of Polychromic Nanobots + Guardian Conductor Building Kit = #L "Guardian Conductor Controller" "202574" Skills: | 5.75EE,4CL,4NP | ------------------------------ Guardian Conductor Controller + Conductor of Presence Program = #L "Conductor of Presence Controller" "202564" Skills: | 5.75EE,4CL,4NP | ------------------------------ Conductor of Presence Controller + HSR Compressed Regenerating Bioplate = #L "Guardian Conductor of Presence" "202987" Skills: | 4ME | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Constructed towers are so much better than prefab ones. Problem is that they dont seem to last long out there these days ;)
